elements.2211.03036_7d53579d87d12c92ff158bcd8c154: Background sound is an informative form of art that is helpful in providing a more immersive experience in real-application voice conversion (VC) scenarios
elements.2211.03036_18576146a4205a8265a15dcf7fa98: However, prior research about VC, mainly focusing on clean voices, pay rare attention to VC with background sound
elements.2211.03036_d0eea17b85b100f0882ebb080a3b9: The critical problem for preserving background sound in VC is inevitable speech distortion by the neural separation model and the cascade mismatch between the source separation model and the VC model
elements.2211.03036_cf79e86293f97bb55bd89cecbb8a4: In this paper, we propose an end-to-end framework via multi-task learning which sequentially cascades a source separation (SS) module, a bottleneck feature extraction module and a VC module
elements.2211.03036_90b9ffc06846c0be9f77e1d29f4d5: Specifically, the source separation task explicitly considers critical phase information and confines the distortion caused by the imperfect separation process
elements.2211.03036_7725354e6546944a35019a6c1ada7: The source separation task, the typical VC task and the unified task shares a uniform reconstruction loss constrained by joint training to reduce the mismatch between the SS and VC modules
elements.2211.03036_7a6b884ea79a86d18deb28096164a: Experimental results demonstrate that our proposed framework significantly outperforms the baseline systems while achieving comparable quality and speaker similarity to the VC models trained with clean data.
elements.2211.03036_66b1c21af3d846ae5c4b1f3eb0915: Voice conversion, background sound, multi-task learning, end-to-end
elements.2211.03036_f1805ddf853af2124ccf23c22e95a: Voice conversion (VC) is a speech signal transformation technique that changes the voice of the original speaker into the target speaker while keeping the linguistic content
elements.2211.03036_919096e4a8a7cf704d759ba8106f2: VC has attracted long-term research interests due to its various applications, such as voice dubbing for movies, personalized speech synthesis and speaker anonymization for voice privacy protection
elements.2211.03036_5953aa192959f48ff53d2987f93cb: With the increasing diversity of VC applications such as audiobook and movie dubbing, there has been rising need for handling the noisy source during conversion
elements.2211.03036_b6ede10ea1983c21aabe4d648c615: First, the source speech in real applications is usually entangled with background sound, such as the mixed sound track of speech and background music in movies and audio books
elements.2211.03036_d2bf9f6d9896371b380eeb356f0ff: This challenges the robustness of current VC system
elements.2211.03036_dee2234ff3903d4cb576df725b90c: Second, to provide better listening experiences, preservation of the original source background sound in the converted audio is also desired
elements.2211.03036_dc8f8884d81f250c54a2423d50db5: It is ideal to have a controllable VC system that can keep or remove the source background sound in the target synthetic speech according to specific applications
elements.2211.03036_a969e4e6cca8b309cdfaf2b505161: Besides, background sound is also a valuable resource for VC-based data augmentation to improve the robustness of downstream systems, such as automatic speech recognition (ASR)
elements.2211.03036_bc8aeab0f027f6b7291c87032267a: Typical VC studies aim to disentangle the linguistic content and speaker timbre from source speech, without explicitly handling background sounds in the source speech
elements.2211.03036_e55142d039af87673be8657fd3928: As noisy source may affect the quality of the converted speech, some prior works
elements.2211.03036_241c1a5348fa311b844db4312cbbd: addressed the background noise problem by using phonetic posteriorgrams (PPGs) or bottleneck features to represent the linguistic content, which is extracted from a multi-condition trained noise-robust automatic speech recognition (ASR) system
elements.2211.03036_8116dc03538e142daf306e77ac4b2: Another straightforward approach is to use an extra denoising model to handle the noisy source speech before voice conversion
elements.2211.03036_2ef31fbf288cfe3b1d72e68b4fc0c: Although noise is suppressed, inevitable speech distortion in the source speech induced by the imperfect denoising process will propagate to downstream and degrade the quality of the converted speech as well
elements.2211.03036_59020fecdde8f2b6fee97af77a5a4: For noise-controllable speech generation, adversarial training has been extensively studied in text-to-speech
elements.2211.03036_db8c4423a58a406483ec751e5a0b0: , while the generated speech can be clean or noisy conditioned on an acoustic tag no matter the speaker training data is clean or noisy
elements.2211.03036_8091f66d74642540cff40a774e0f7: The problem is that the synthetic noisy speech only contains some kind of
elements.2211.03036_b061aa2115a3e8feae0e23a9cfdd6: averaged" noise learned from the training data
elements.2211.03036_fbc00b3cf5c9f8aa241307f67a1ab: Such an approach is not suitable for background sound preservation in the VC scenario
elements.2211.03036_ff6abfe4c66e7de3ac29e487afbae: To address this problem, a noisy-to-noisy VC framework
elements.2211.03036_83a43c715cbc6fa098f7c20a02925: is proposed which adopts a pre-trained neural denoising module to conduct VC while preserving background sound at the same time
elements.2211.03036_78e544238493cb9315d492b67bd2f: Specifically, the denoised speech is fed to the VC module and the residual (noisy speech subtracts the denoised speech) is regarded as the background sound which is finally combined with the converted speech
elements.2211.03036_92d1e934f23425521320d9038bac1: Similarly, helping with a per-trained source separation model, the singing voice conversion approach in
elements.2211.03036_e5e72b4583c54817231f43ffbda9b: manages to preserve background music (BGM) in the converted singing by simply concatenating the separated BGM with the converted speech
elements.2211.03036_a1c8f2dcf98029e05a6f3154115d4: The above approaches deal with noisy source by cascading individually trained denoising/separation model and VC model
elements.2211.03036_ace52473da6d63e762ba8e6347a99: Besides the different training objectives, as mentioned earlier, the inevitable distortion (error) in speech as well as in the background sound induced by the imperfect front-end module may lead to inferior sound quality with audible artifacts in the converted audio.
elements.2211.03036_685277d1c5e4a1200f85b9f4ece0c: To address this problem, we propose an end-to-end (E2E) framework in a multi-task learning manner for VC in the presence of background sound
elements.2211.03036_dea824ad3df9131409f94ae23eca3: We shape our E2E approach by sequentially cascading a source separation (SS) module, a bottleneck feature extraction module and a VC module with multiple specifically designed learning objectives
elements.2211.03036_34a1d733c42c8db43b21dffef4110: Specifically, the source separation task is formed with a deep complex convolution recurrent network (DCCRN)
elements.2211.03036_aeef5c7c52e822691e8e2e57b63b1: optimized by power-law compressed phase-aware (PLCPA) loss and asymmetry loss
elements.2211.03036_591b6eb9cfa0f18984c45c6fd2aca: Here critical phase information is explicitly considered and distortion is confined by leveraging the recent advances in neural source separation
elements.2211.03036_cb931bdb7f3cfe16cafeeed6e0e6b: Besides the source separation task and the typical VC task, importantly, the unified task shares a uniform reconstruction loss constrained by joint training to reduce the mismatch between the SS and VC modules while ensuring the quality of the converted speech
elements.2211.03036_fbc772fa3554223585bc78b480778: Experiments and ablation studies show the significant advantages of the proposed approach.
elements.2211.03036_3e1b180c095f0209a6eb7ba6f2c10: (a), the proposed framework consists of three modules, e.g. the bottleneck feature extraction module, SS module, and VC module
elements.2211.03036_81da33b57f4d1a9890efce6f90940: With the above modules, we approach the problem of VC with background sound via a three-step process: 1) separating vocal and background sound from the input signal using the SS module, 2) conducting voice conversion on vocal using the VC module with the bottleneck feature as input, 3) superimposing the converted voice with background sound extracted by the SS module
elements.2211.03036_205c081a912a2ab2d60f8c8383ee8: The bottleneck feature extraction module is a pre-trained ASR encoder developed by WeNet tools
elements.2211.03036_229212ffdd781f9622fa986413a0c: and is available on the official website
elements.2211.03036_c913d33af12582eb3f9552a71ca40: The SS module and VC modules are trained beforehand with different datasets separately, and then jointly trained by multi-task learning with the bottleneck feature extraction module frozen.
elements.2211.03036_dc52eab9b032119190c3b639669a0: Due to the large parameters and complex structure, most current source separation models are usually too bulky to be jointly trained with the VC task
elements.2211.03036_431c2b6c77dd7e5a3aa01bc4ab031: Therefore, we adopt DCCRN as our SS module
elements.2211.03036_7d95a7ddb236221430314605ea6d5: , which only has 3.7M parameters and achieved the best performance for Deep Noise Suppression (DNS) challenge in the real-time track
elements.2211.03036_c6d0ddca7494587e3050418032caa: The original DCCRN estimates complex ratio mask (CRM) by the real and imaginary parts of the noisy complex spectrogram
elements.2211.03036_1c2015ce2e500c2777f1cdbfd5187: In this paper, DCCRN is used as a source separation model by adding additional CRM of clean speech, as shown in Figure
elements.2211.03036_946de86f0661318468d8c95463732: Meanwhile, we use power-law compressed phase-aware asymmetric (PLCPA-ASYM) loss to replace the original scale-invariant signal-to-noise ratio (SI-SNR) loss to confine speech distortion and achieve better power control
elements.2211.03036_3b8c0fe509ffb5dac57423b00950e: are the estimated and clean spectrograms, respectively
elements.2211.03036_89ddb9828cdd35111840f7a3068dc: PLCPA loss is defined as follows:
elements.2211.03036_61387d0ef8a78a62c3ca0bd64bde2: are the total time and frequency frames, respectively, while
elements.2211.03036_c8ae97485f750716341456791cbc9: stand for time and frequency index
elements.2211.03036_6636f80658098695708b634be1034: calculates the argument of a complex number while the weighted coefficient between the phase-aware components and amplitude is
elements.2211.03036_da1ee58d940edc5b901dc5e5312a4: is adapted to the amplitude part of the PLCPA loss to alleviate the over-suppression (OS) issue, which is defined as
elements.2211.03036_2fb93b7782185bb47f8252a57f746: So that the final PLCPA-ASYM loss can be defined as
elements.2211.03036_655c153ebe1afe1be38f8022658b8: is the positive weighting coefficient for
elements.2211.03036_9880d8df4ace08b940bc37d5f3272: After extracting the speech from source waveforms with background sound through the SS module, we hire a VC module to transform the speech into the target speaker
elements.2211.03036_61b9de69359e6bfc763aad5b1ee38: (c), the VC module goes through single-stage training for efficient end-to-end learning
elements.2211.03036_8b64c957bc8b319aef4e8e801d785: The VC module consists of a convolutional long short-term memory (CLSTM) encoder and a HiFiGAN-based decoder
elements.2211.03036_3f14813c50fe6ce8ee16930250d1a: , which aim at high-level linguistic representation encoding and waveform reconstruction, respectively
elements.2211.03036_d27de0de4f2d2e65e8807a9a99b35: CLSTM consists of three stacks of convolution layers followed by the LeakyReLU activation function and a LSTM layer
elements.2211.03036_df304a32ef7f1b2493cf181bd7241: The speaker embedding from the lookup table is fed to the decoder as conditions for target voice generation
elements.2211.03036_994e58026f891a892ca3aac2b22e7: The architecture and objective of the decoder generator follow the same configuration as HiFi-GAN
elements.2211.03036_d340bebcda9a5db32cf2d0c02b8ab: To reduce the mismatch between the SS module and VC module during voice conversion in the presence of background sound, we adopt the multi-task learning strategy in the following steps: 1) only the VC module is optimized by the VC training loss with the SS module frozen; 2) only the SS module is optimized by PLCPA-ASYM loss with VC module frozen; 3) both the SS and VC modules are jointly optimized in a multi-task learning manner
elements.2211.03036_02bf1ebcbea1a54b45d4fef5c87a9: The bottleneck feature extraction module is frozen at each stage.
elements.2211.03036_73340e0a9214fc19bb4f7690fb778: The unified task aims at optimizing the composed waveform with vocals and background sound by minimizing the reconstruction loss
elements.2211.03036_9e4f1641428a8a2b2b5400b22d605: We denote the Mel-spectrogram of training data as
elements.2211.03036_4f7b0f246e1572f4bae47ed9ce523: , which is the Mel-spectrogram composed of speech audio
elements.2211.03036_885f7a63d942dc44d16182de0601b: The reconstruction loss for the unified task is defined as
elements.2211.03036_6c4716399abce6ac2cd3d61e4ef4d: is the Mel-spectrogram of the reconstructed waveform containing speech voice and background sound.
elements.2211.03036_03dbeb0fc3cde65de4df19b3c9606: The source separation task considers critical phase information and uses PLCPA-ASYM loss to optimize the estimated CRM and confine the separated speech and background distortion
elements.2211.03036_63b17b99dec9051d62bff7d356dc9: PLCPA-ASYM loss is calculated for the separated speech and background sound, denoted by
elements.2211.03036_81098048f499db4db1027bdb8bb00: The objective of the typical VC task with no background sound follows HiFiGAN
elements.2211.03036_3dddebd39d23d9b21a28a30fde029: We adopt the L1 loss as reconstruction loss to optimize the spectrogram
elements.2211.03036_b9321402c05af650be351640100ee: To improve the performance of voice conversion, we employ adversarial training for more natural speech
elements.2211.03036_68bf26467e53ce23795fab57ec937: The adversarial generator loss of the single-task VC is calculated as
elements.2211.03036_86de12d139715d9d7803e16aceed1: For adversarial training stability, feature matching loss is also used as
elements.2211.03036_706606641a9f36fc96ae845aa4a08: denotes the total number of layers in the discriminator and
elements.2211.03036_c5e0aa7275d518ede2ba55f9a4bb4: produces the feature map of the
elements.2211.03036_25a24b92ddc4f94ae2d5cd98899e9: The joint training process will combine the SS and VC modules into a single unit if the source separation losses and voice conversion losses are not added, rendering the separated intermediate results useless and unable to control whether the background sound is preserved
elements.2211.03036_8cd40caf339ae1ed23253d4fb8559: The SS and VC modules share a uniform reconstruction loss constrained by joint training and the SS module can be regarded as data augmentation or a desirable pre-process model for the VC module to improve robustness
elements.2211.03036_8fdca08cb1b5db20d8f820dfba24a: The final loss function of our multi-task learning approach is a weighted sum of the following losses:
elements.2211.03036_ef583bcdfe7601e409d0d22d6272a: are hyper-parameters balancing loss terms of each task
elements.2211.03036_56df277fabf0dfd171eefdba59f5a: We train the SS module and VC module on two different datasets
elements.2211.03036_3d42d9787f994ac6ab6e421ccd1c1: To train the SS module, we use the MUSDB18-train dataset
elements.2211.03036_ed1fd427d6b6b884c9d49d1bc93ec: , which contains 100 full lengths of music tracks of different genres and their isolated drums, bass, vocals, and other items
elements.2211.03036_40d1569b0820bb9926eddc4698ff3: The VC module is trained on VCTK dataset
elements.2211.03036_ebce9bd6538638d5e8cc566313709: which contains 110 English speakers and 400 utterances per speaker
elements.2211.03036_35a5d568681335eafdd37b060247f: For the joint training of the SS and VC module, MUSDB18-train and VCTK datasets are mixed to conduct the evaluation of the background sound VC
elements.2211.03036_17d896630dd19d68e40de8b9d05c6: Background sound is randomly selected from the dataset and reprocessed to be clipped as the same length as speech data by a certain signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) range of
elements.2211.03036_eda9617dd7c027eb93e211a148199: We randomly select 4 source speakers (i.e. p245, p264, p270, and p361) and 2 target speakers (i.e. p294 and p334) from the VCTK dataset mixed with clips from the MUSDB18-test dataset for conducting evaluations
elements.2211.03036_2b0385058b8f5a30af4dd60440189: For each source and target speaker, 30 utterances are reserved as the test set
elements.2211.03036_4d737c2ed4e06ad9b8675824ea5cc: All training and evaluation data are conducted on 16 kHz sampling rate.
elements.2211.03036_642cf67a174e1eeeeff74a2f0124d: For a fair comparison, we conduct evaluations on the following systems with the same VC module: 1) Upper Bound, where the audio is converted from clean source voice and then superimposed with the original background sound; 2) Baseline1 (Sep), consisting of a VC module and a separation model
elements.2211.03036_01f6d4cff5f5ab772c2c2ae615a75: by individual training, the same source separation approach as
elements.2211.03036_78f79d855d71f232bf47bab47e52f: ; 3) Baseline2 (Sep + Denoise), containing a VC module, the same separation model as Baseline1 and the same denoising model as
elements.2211.03036_8d7a768001232dd812a9935efb751: , which can be regarded as a more robust source separation way than
elements.2211.03036_88f2ebbfc8a1e774c32561fc0d4c7: ; 4) Proposed, the multi-task learning framework proposed in this paper
elements.2211.03036_8fb9e2d8c11677883589f7164c703: The effectiveness of the proposed framework compared with the baseline systems is investigated by objective and subjective evaluations
elements.2211.03036_e0fe43b1768e88cdc230ca8bf8387: For subjective evaluation, we use comparative mean opinion score (CMOS) to compare the converted speech with background sound to the baseline system and use Upper Bound results as the reference to determine the ensemble quality
elements.2211.03036_b9d6bac20f56602131edd988e65c7: To evaluate the quality and similarity more effectively, we also conducted a mean opinion score (MOS) test on the converted speech without superimposing the background sound
elements.2211.03036_e30e3e84f708ae378a5a8e37c00ef: , and perceptual evaluation of speech quality (PESQ)
elements.2211.03036_d8876716240befe9c9123e72dac1f: are employed as the objective metrics to evaluate separated background sound and converted speech
elements.2211.03036_477badb0b173f2fb6ce71db65a515: We first evaluate the overall performance of VC in the presence of background sound by CMOS tests between the compared systems and the Upper Bound, as shown in Table
elements.2211.03036_c6f0d91ebf4cd835e0ebab11e31df: The results of CMOS, i.e. -0.54 of only separation approach, -0.35 of separation and denoising approach, and -0.12 of Proposed, demonstrate that the proposed framework achieves a statistically significant preference compared with baseline systems
elements.2211.03036_817ffd8ca3315a9a9ba416297ef70: In addition, the score of -0.12 indicates that the converted speech with background sound from the proposed framework has slight regression compared to Upper Bound in ensemble quality
elements.2211.03036_eb780e1a2b508d9742a40ea49582c: To evaluate the quality and speaker similarity of the converted speech, we conduct MOS tests on different systems, as shown in Table
elements.2211.03036_d05f9059353096f43ed03098b4427: For more accurate rating results, we use the converted speech without superposing background sound for perceptive listening tests
elements.2211.03036_656d44b833d33579166fec28146f6: We can find that the proposed framework achieves better results for the audio quality than the two baselines
elements.2211.03036_3401cb014c5caa95edc2334d20c8a: Meanwhile, the MOS also indicates that the audio quality generated from in-gender voice conversion is better than cross-gender
elements.2211.03036_9f49d6cfd14aa0a15f8d351a47aea: For the speaker similarity, the results show that our proposed framework significantly outperforms baselines in both cross-gender and in-gender
elements.2211.03036_7747a52dec9beb740af2817dcac0f: The subjective results demonstrate the proposed multi-task learning framework can effectively deal with noise source and convert the voice to the target speaker with background sound.
elements.2211.03036_bf4b8e542c7ce63b00ee33e40910f: For precise evaluations, we individually calculate the SI-SDR and PESQ results on speech and background sound before superimposing, since the superimposed audio may conceal the detail of speech and background sound
elements.2211.03036_9d34215d699973e60f77ce2422ec9: Because of the same separation model employed by model
elements.2211.03036_ebeac058b19388010bcccdadc2979: , the two baselines have the same SI-SDR and PESQ results of background sound
elements.2211.03036_0e8555799da8897f4346c965ee4de: The objective results are shown in Table
elements.2211.03036_c485494d9a96ad7a2b84342422272: For evaluations on speech, the proposed framework achieves the highest scores on SI-SDR and PESQ than two baselines, which verifies the good performance of the proposed framework on the separated voice
elements.2211.03036_4f3a2fa467d16b3d383600dca89f8: In addition, we find that model Sep+Denoise obtains the same PESQ score with our proposed framework
elements.2211.03036_1af80a5a62e7845cb0229493d1431: It demonstrates our SS module can achieve similar separated speech results as the state-of-the-art denoising model which further indicates the effectiveness of the proposed SS module in multi-task learning
elements.2211.03036_3f25bc3e259ebe3fb535d53bd74b1: Regarding background sound, our proposed framework outperforms two baselines and achieves the highest scores in the SI-SDR and PESQ metrics, i.e. 11.11 and 2.56, respectively
elements.2211.03036_b46a665d76b0c4fa23b52d05ddd87: According to the objective results, our multi-task learning framework can achieve better separated results than baseline systems by a single source separation module.
elements.2211.03036_043202c2dbb106f3d5fef7bc38cd3: To further investigate the effectiveness of each component in our framework, we conduct ablation studies for speech and background sound by subjective and objective metrics, respectively, as shown in Table
elements.2211.03036_f356dc291b4ed0f1e0e5261d5dc20: In the ablation studies, we remove the loss of the source separation task and the voice conversion task in the procedure of joint training.
elements.2211.03036_b9562ef5b3ac1dc8c3fb18dca783b: The results demonstrate that variants without SS loss
elements.2211.03036_8e5ee9d21b9746b797eb7055f9e90: " get worse performance in both subjective and objective metrics
elements.2211.03036_a0450a89bde540107dea949675573: ", the separated background sound degrades by a large margin in terms of SI-SDR and PESQ
elements.2211.03036_9525200ddef586d17533bb5eed946: Besides, the Mel-spectrogram of the vocal part is damaged severely
elements.2211.03036_4742df52111385d5ecfdf2f1d7666: ", it achieves worse speech quality and similarity than variant
elements.2211.03036_a3cc44f6a69ede75a3de0f0907409: " but slightly better PESQ result than the proposed framework, which indicates that removing VC loss makes the variant pay more attention to separation
elements.2211.03036_79d6bc8fc74be0396e7019e8fc21e: In addition, the variant without joint training degrades speech and background sound performance
elements.2211.03036_b52270d48f0a0494b55fae39cc2cc: We believe the reason is that there exists a mismatch between the SS module and VC module when using the separation results directly for conversion, leading to distortion of the conversion result
elements.2211.03036_3563a5636b73e2ce535f59f6c139e: The ablation studies verify the effectiveness of our proposed multi-task learning approach on VC with background sound.
elements.2211.03036_e52ddeeaabe841f0aba3c6af2b338: In this paper, we present an end-to-end framework in a multi-task manner that can produce high-quality VC in the presence of background sound and is capable of flexible controlling linguistic content, background sound, and speaker timbre
elements.2211.03036_009941dcb85401e469baeddc2ed07: The framework sequentially cascades a SS module, a bottleneck feature extraction module and a VC module
elements.2211.03036_ad8b93ee668e06cb181597eafcbbc: The SS module is formed with DCCRN and confines the distortion by leveraging the PLCPA-ASYM loss
elements.2211.03036_46480eea1a5df26e8a04b68ff59ac: To tackle the disentangling problem between the vocal and the background sound, we employ multi-task loss to constrain the outputs of the SS and VC modules
elements.2211.03036_5b48586376c560bc6fbe6778c95af: Furthermore, the source separation task, the voice conversion task, and the unified task share a uniform reconstruction loss to reduce the mismatch between the SS module and the VC module
elements.2211.03036_b88f8bab3fb99087b4ba17b8c48bb: The subjective and objective evaluation results demonstrate that the proposed framework has higher speech quality and similarity, effectively bridging the margin on the ensemble quality between the baseline and the upper bound.
